translations: 火器，枪炮；轻武器（firearm 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The police were issued with firearms.
sentences.translation: 警察都配发了小型枪支。

sentences.sentence: He was also charged with illegal possession of firearms.
sentences.translation: 他还被指控非法拥有火器。

sentences.sentence: The legislation will be widened to include all firearms.
sentences.translation: 这项法规的范围将扩大到包括所有的枪支。
